text: Mattar MRT station offers a convenient commute for those in the area. Situated near a junction of Mattar Road and Merpati Road, it provides easy access to surrounding locations. The station itself is clean and well-maintained, ensuring a pleasant travel experience. Especially for those moving towards the industrial buildings.

Well maintain MRT station.
Nothing much to explore surrounding the MRT.
Singapore Blue colour code Downtown line Mrt Station no_25. This  Matter mrt station start open 21oct2017...

Mattar MRT Station is one of the well polished and fabricated MRT Station in Singapore. Actually all the MRT Stations are really commendable in Singapore. Specially there cleanliness, timing accuracy, system all are fantastic. He/she who has a basic knowledge on English Language and has a minimum common sense can be able to browse the total Singapore city just with the help of written directions, MRT, bus and Google Map.
Very nice MRT. The toilets are quite clean. The station has very few people. Pretty lightings.
